scope: M22 taxonomy rename pass for stale RL metadata outside future true-RL track

before.title: Agent Lightning RL Port (Tau)
before.description: Port Agent Lightning reinforcement learning pipeline into Tau as native Rust crates across phased delivery (foundation, APO, production hardening).

after.title: Agent Lightning Prompt Optimization Port (Tau)
after.description: Port Agent Lightning prompt optimization pipeline into Tau as native Rust crates across phased delivery (foundation, APO-style prompt optimization, production hardening). Future true reinforcement-learning work is tracked separately in Milestone #24.

milestone_changes.rationale: Milestone #6 represents completed prompt-optimization delivery and should not be labeled as current RL; true RL remains tracked in Milestone #24.
